nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around -14, with temperatures rising to around -12 overnight. Wind chill values as low as -22. East wind around 3 mph.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: Snow after 9am. Cloudy, with a high near 11. Wind chill values as low as -23. Southeast wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 6, with temperatures rising to around 13 overnight. South wind 6 to 10 mph.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 38. Southwest wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of freezing rain between midnight and 3am, then a slight chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 24. West wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.shortForecast: Rain And Snow then Rain And Snow Likely
nws.detailedForecast: Rain and snow before noon, then rain and snow likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 41. West wind 8 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 38 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.shortForecast: Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 7. Northwest wind 12 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 38 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after noon. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 16. East wind 8 to 12 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Snow likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 4. Northeast wind around 10 mph. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.
